alert.note: Alert for Baker; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, southeastern Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and central Charlton Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Stephen Foster State Park to near Fargo. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Fargo and Stephen Foster State Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
